short_summary: The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada requires modification to the existing power system of our mobile lab.
description: The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada requires modification to the existing power system of our mobile lab. Bidders must provide must clearly demonstrate compliance with the Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
## Modification to Power System of Mobile Lab

### Tender Details
* **Tender Number**: WS3763192968
* **Publication Date**: November 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: January 13, 2023

### Procurement Overview
The Department of the Environment and Climate Change Canada invites bids for the modification of the existing power system of our mobile lab. The procurement is open to all eligible suppliers.

### Key Requirements

* The bidder must provide evidence of compliance with the Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.
* The contract will be awarded to the bidder who offers the lowest cost-per-point.

### Commercial
* **Procurement Category**: Services - LRV (Light, Vehicular, and Watercraft)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Toronto
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

### Contracting and Contact Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact**: Berends, Robert (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14718938?extsite=MTQ3MTg5MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: January 19, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: January 13, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None (est. to be determined)
* Expected Contract End Date: None (est. to be determined)

The Department of the Environment and Climate Change Canada welcomes all interested bidders to this tender opportunity. Please note that the tender has expired; however, information remains available for reference. Supplied information may be used to prepare for similar opportunities in the future.
